channel.title: Comments on: Duds to Aces: 8 Must-Know Tips To Increase Tennis Serve Power
channel.description: Your secret weapon on the court.

item.title: By: john
item.dc:creator: john
item.description: Hi. I'm surprised that with the platform stance you say that the front leg works more than the back leg. You can't push with the front leg, you must use both and sometimes the back leg can me used more than the front leg.
item.content:encoded:
Hi. I’m surprised that with the platform stance you say that the front leg works more than the back leg.
You can’t push with the front leg, you must use both and sometimes the back leg can me used more than the front leg.
